pluggable.name: hMallow2
pluggable.author: MatthewM (somefool)
pluggable.description:
Very simple, clean theme based on K2 which comes with Habari and WP-Mallow2 - my WordPress theme which itself is based on Wp-Mallow and Kubrick.

Supports many plugins, including: TagCloud, fluffytag, blogroll, deliciousfeed, audioscrobbler, lastrecent, flickrfeed, twitter, Brightkite, gravatar, twitteravatar, colophon.
